snippet: The poll, conducted by Siena College, found that 65 percent of registered voters across the state had a favorable opinion of  Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, up from 58 percent in June.
lead_paragraph: The poll, conducted by Siena College, found that 65 percent of registered voters across the state had a favorable opinion of  Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, up from 58 percent in June.

headline.main: Poll Shows Modest Rise in Cuomo’s Popularity
